name: Exxotic: Endless Warfare
description:
A new free to play, endless game!

Exxotic: Endless Warfare!

A simple, fun and realistic looking game! It has everything a normal FPS game has!

Except scenarios.

Here are the controls!

A - Aim

Use your mouse to shoot.

P - Open Pause menu, and use O to close the menu.

Comment Ideas that you want in the game!
